name: Holiday Gift Guide (Notion Template)
description: For a stress-free holiday shopping experience.✔️ Plan out what you're gifting to who✔️ Set a budget for each person✔️ Schedule order deliveries in a calendar✔️ Track the status of gifts, from ideation to wrapped.Have a question or concern?Email me at hi@chichi.fyi, or DM me on Twitter @madebychichi.
